name: tm71
effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
